ygData.subject: Where runes hide
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I found three on Scarecrows (but I killed a whole lotta scarecrows), two on Snow Orc Shamans (sent a good number of those skywards too), and another (which
ygData.messageBody:
>
> Congratulations Robert!
> As a budding Wizard, I am curious where you happened upon the runes necessary
> to make Pillar of Fire? I've been searching all over for them and as yet no
> luck.
> Trev


I found three on Scarecrows (but I killed a whole lotta scarecrows), two on
Snow Orc Shamans (sent a good number of those skywards too), and another (which
blows the intelligent creatures only theory) I bought from a Barbarian who had
just gotten it from a Wooly Mammouth his party had just killed. The couple
others I have I just bought by doing /auction Buying Runes alot. Most people
don't even know what they are and are glad to sell them. I've been paying two
plat for them. So I think it is pretty random on higher lever critters.

Robert Davis





rob.davis@...
